DECIMAL_MAX: must be less than ${inclusive == true ? 'or equal to ' : ''}{value}
DECIMAL_MIN: must be greater than ${inclusive == true ? 'or equal to ' : ''}{value}
DIGITS: numeric value out of bounds (<{integer} digits>.<{fraction} digits> expected)
MAX: must be less than or equal to {max}
MIN: must be greater than or equal to {min}
PARAMETERS_SCRIPT_ASSERT: script expression "{script}" didn't evaluate to true
SCRIPT_ASSERT: script expression "{script}" didn't evaluate to true
